author: cnbc.com
title: Synopsys Initiates $165 Million Accelerated Share Repurchase Agreement
text:
MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif., May 31, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Synopsys, Inc. (Nasdaq: SNPS) today announced that it has entered into an accelerated share repurchase agreement (ASR) with Wells Fargo Bank NA to repurchase an aggregate of $165 million of Synopsys stock.
Under the terms of the ASR, Synopsys will receive an aggregate initial share delivery of approximately 1.5 million shares, with the remainder, if any, to be settled on or before November 1, 2018, upon completion of the repurchases. The specific number of shares that Synopsys ultimately repurchases under the ASR will be based on Synopsys' volume-weighted average share price during the repurchase period, less a discount.
